identity.name: Akuma Finder
identity.description: A high-tech encyclopedia disguised as an ancient pirate artifact. It fuses the raw, gritty aesthetic of the Grand Line with the precision of a modern database.
design_principles: Fusion: Pirate Cartography x Cyberpunk Database
Immersion: Every interaction feels like unlocking a treasure chest
Clarity: Data is king, but style is the emperor
Motion: Everything is alive, like the sea

headings.usage: Main titles, Hero sections, 'Wanted' poster headers

grid_system.bento_mode: Use 'Tetris' grid for marketing/home, 'Control Room' grid for encyclopedia

containers.card_style: border border-[#d4c5a3]/20 bg-[#0f172a]/80 backdrop-blur-md rounded-xl overflow-hidden relative group
containers.wanted_poster: bg-[#fef3c7] text-[#2a2a2a] shadow-xl transform rotate-1 hover:rotate-0 transition-all duration-300 border-4 border-[#d4c5a3]

buttons.primary: bg-[#FFD700] text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-widest hover:bg-[#C5A000] transition-colors px-8 py-3 rounded-sm clip-path-slant
buttons.secondary: border border-[#FFD700] text-[#FFD700] hover:bg-[#FFD700]/10 px-8 py-3 rounded-sm uppercase tracking-widest

inputs.search_bar: bg-[#1e293b]/50 border border-[#d4c5a3]/30 text-[#e2e8f0] placeholder:text-[#64748b] focus:border-[#FFD700] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#FFD700] rounded-lg h-12 px-4 w-full transition-all

cards.fruit_card: relative overflow-hidden bg-gradient-to-b from-[#1e293b] to-[#0f172a] border border-[#334155] hover:border-[#FFD700] transition-all duration-300 group
cards.wanted_card: bg-[url('https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1706271952257-bc67d3c2c0e4?crop=entropy&cs=srgb&fm=jpg&q=85')] bg-cover text-[#3f2e18] font-serif p-4 shadow-2xl border-8 border-double border-[#5c4033]

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px, Gold or Muted Blue color

assets.image_search_instructions: When searching for fruit images, use specific terms like 'Gomu Gomu no Mi fruit anime', 'Mera Mera no Mi fruit design'. If real images fail, use abstract elemental representations (e.g., 'swirling fire sphere' for Mera Mera).

styles.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4 }}

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large heading.
Ensure all text on dark backgrounds has sufficient contrast (APCA check).
Images must be optimized and lazy-loaded.
For the 'Black Market', use a ticker/marquee effect for prices.
The 'Wanted' poster style should be used sparingly for high-impact items (Top 10, Rare finds).
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'lucide-react', 'framer-motion', 'clsx', 'tailwind-merge'. 2. Set up the Tailwind config with the custom colors and fonts defined above. 3. Create a 'Layout' component that wraps the app with the dark theme and texture overlays. 4. Build the 'FruitCard' component first as it is the core UI element. 5. Use the provided texture URLs for backgrounds.
